title.raw: 《司馬穰苴列傳》 Biography of Sima Rangju

sentences.zh: 司馬穰苴者，田完之苗裔也。

translations.literal: Sima Rangju was Tian Wan's descendant.

sentences.zh: 齊景公時，晉伐阿、甄，而燕侵河上，齊師敗績。

translations.literal: In Qi Jing Gong's time, Jin attacked A and Zhen, while Yan invaded the river region, Qi army suffered defeat.

sentences.zh: 景公患之。

translations.literal: Jing Gong worried about it.

sentences.zh: 晏嬰乃薦田穰苴曰：「穰苴雖田氏庶孽，然其人文能附眾，武能威敵，願君試之。」

translations.literal: Yan Ying then recommended Tian Rangju saying: 'Rangju though Tian clan's bastard branch, yet his civil ability attaches the masses, martial ability awes enemies, wish Your Majesty test him.'

sentences.zh: 景公召穰苴，與語兵事，大說之，以為將軍，將兵捍燕晉之師。

translations.literal: Jing Gong summoned Rangju, spoke with him about military affairs, greatly pleased, made him general, led troops to defend against Yan and Jin armies.

sentences.zh: 穰苴曰：「臣素卑賤，君擢之閭伍之中，加之大夫之上，士卒未附，百姓不信，人微權輕，願得君之寵臣，國之所尊，以監軍，乃可。」

translations.literal: Rangju said: 'Subject originally lowly, Your Majesty raised me from the ranks, placed me above grand officers, soldiers not yet attached, people not yet trusting, person lowly authority light, wish to obtain Your Majesty's favored minister, the state's honored one, to supervise the army, then acceptable.'

sentences.zh: 於是景公許之，使莊賈往。

translations.literal: Thus Jing Gong permitted it, sent Zhuang Jia to go.

sentences.zh: 穰苴既辭，與莊賈約曰：「旦日日中會於軍門。」

translations.literal: Rangju having taken leave, made agreement with Zhuang Jia saying: 'Tomorrow noon meet at army gate.'

sentences.zh: 穰苴先馳至軍，立表下漏待賈。

translations.literal: Rangju first galloped to army, erected pole set water clock awaited Jia.

sentences.zh: 賈素驕貴，以為將己之軍而己為監，不甚急；

translations.literal: Jia originally arrogant noble, considered the general his own army yet himself the supervisor, not very urgent;

sentences.zh: 親戚左右送之，留飲。

translations.literal: relatives and attendants sent him, stayed drinking.

sentences.zh: 日中而賈不至。

translations.literal: At noon Jia not arrived.

sentences.zh: 穰苴則仆表決漏，入，行軍勒兵，申明約束。

translations.literal: Rangju then overturned pole broke water clock, entered, conducted army restrained troops, explained regulations.

sentences.zh: 約束既定，夕時，莊賈乃至。

translations.literal: Regulations established, evening time, Zhuang Jia then arrived.

sentences.zh: 穰苴曰：「何後期為？」

translations.literal: Rangju said: 'Why late?'

sentences.zh: 賈謝曰：「不佞大夫親戚送之，故留。」

translations.literal: Jia apologized saying: 'Unworthy grand officer's relatives sent me, thus stayed.'

sentences.zh: 穰苴曰：「將受命之日則忘其家，臨軍約束則忘其親，援枹鼓之急則忘其身。

translations.literal: Rangju said: 'General receiving command day then forgets his home, facing army regulations then forgets his relatives, grasping drumsticks' urgency then forgets his body.

sentences.zh: 今敵國深侵，邦內騷動，士卒暴露於境，君寢不安席，食不甘味，百姓之命皆懸於君，何謂相送乎！」

translations.literal: Now enemy states deeply invade, state within disturbed, soldiers exposed on border, lord sleeps not at ease on mat, eats not sweet flavor, people's lives all hang on lord, what called sending off!'

sentences.zh: 召軍正問曰：「軍法期而後至者雲何？」

translations.literal: Summoned army officer asked saying: 'Military law arriving after appointed time what?'

sentences.zh: 對曰：「當斬。」

translations.literal: Answered: 'Should behead.'

sentences.zh: 莊賈懼，使人馳報景公，請救。

translations.literal: Zhuang Jia feared, sent men galloped to report Jing Gong, requested rescue.

sentences.zh: 既往，未及反，於是遂斬莊賈以徇三軍。

translations.literal: Already gone, not yet returned, thus then beheaded Zhuang Jia to show three armies.

sentences.zh: 三軍之士皆振慄。

translations.literal: Three armies' soldiers all trembled.

sentences.zh: 久之，景公遣使者持節赦賈，馳入軍中。

translations.literal: After long time, Jing Gong sent envoy holding tally to pardon Jia, galloped into army.

sentences.zh: 穰苴曰：「將在軍，君令有所不受。」

translations.literal: Rangju said: 'General in army, lord's commands have some not accepted.'

sentences.zh: 問軍正曰：「馳三軍法何？」

translations.literal: Asked army officer: 'Galloping through three armies law what?'

sentences.zh: 正曰：「當斬。」

translations.literal: Officer said: 'Should behead.'

sentences.zh: 使者大懼。

translations.literal: Envoy greatly feared.

sentences.zh: 穰苴曰：「君之使不可殺之。」

translations.literal: Rangju said: 'Lord's envoy cannot kill him.'

sentences.zh: 乃斬其仆，車之左駙，馬之左驂，以徇三軍。

translations.literal: Thus beheaded his groom, chariot's left driver, horse's left trace, to show three armies.

sentences.zh: 遣使者還報，然後行。

translations.literal: Sent envoy back to report, then proceeded.

sentences.zh: 士卒次舍井灶飲食問疾醫藥，身自拊循之。

translations.literal: Soldiers' encampments wells stoves food drink asked illness medicine, personally stroked and comforted them.

sentences.zh: 悉取將軍之資糧享士卒，身與士卒平分糧食。

translations.literal: All took general's provisions to feast soldiers, body shared rations equally with soldiers.

sentences.zh: 最比其羸弱者，三日而後勒兵。

translations.literal: First ranked their weak ones, three days then restrained troops.

sentences.zh: 病者皆求行，爭奮出為之赴戰。

translations.literal: Sick ones all sought to go, contended to rouse out for battle.

sentences.zh: 晉師聞之，為罷去。

translations.literal: Jin army heard it, withdrew and left.

sentences.zh: 燕師聞之，度水而解。

translations.literal: Yan army heard it, crossed water and dispersed.

sentences.zh: 於是追擊之，遂取所亡封內故境而引兵歸。

translations.literal: Thus pursued them, then took the lost sealed territories former borders and led troops back.

sentences.zh: 未至國，釋兵旅，解約束，誓盟而後入邑。

translations.literal: Not yet reached state, released troops, dissolved regulations, swore covenant then entered towns.

sentences.zh: 景公與諸大夫郊迎，勞師成禮，然後反歸寢。

translations.literal: Jing Gong with various grand officers welcomed in suburbs, rewarded army completed rites, then returned to palace.

sentences.zh: 既見穰苴，尊為大司馬。

translations.literal: Having seen Rangju, honored him as Grand Marshal.

sentences.zh: 田氏日以益尊於齊。

translations.literal: Tian clan day by day increasingly honored in Qi.

Sima Rangju was Tian Wan's descendant. In Qi Jing Gong's time, Jin attacked A and Zhen, while Yan invaded the river region, Qi army suffered defeat. Jing Gong worried about it. Yan Ying then recommended Tian Rangju saying: 'Rangju though Tian clan's bastard branch, yet his civil ability attaches the masses, martial ability awes enemies, wish Your Majesty test him.' Jing Gong summoned Rangju, spoke with him about military affairs, greatly pleased, made him general, led troops to defend against Yan and Jin armies. Rangju said: 'Subject originally lowly, Your Majesty raised me from the ranks, placed me above grand officers, soldiers not yet attached, people not yet trusting, person lowly authority light, wish to obtain Your Majesty's favored minister, the state's honored one, to supervise the army, then acceptable.' Thus Jing Gong permitted it, sent Zhuang Jia to go. Rangju having taken leave, made agreement with Zhuang Jia saying: 'Tomorrow noon meet at army gate.' Rangju first galloped to army, erected pole set water clock awaited Jia. Jia originally arrogant noble, considered the general his own army yet himself the supervisor, not very urgent; relatives and attendants sent him, stayed drinking. At noon Jia not arrived. Rangju then overturned pole broke water clock, entered, conducted army restrained troops, explained regulations. Regulations established, evening time, Zhuang Jia then arrived. Rangju said: 'Why late?' Jia apologized saying: 'Unworthy grand officer's relatives sent me, thus stayed.' Rangju said: 'General receiving command day then forgets his home, facing army regulations then forgets his relatives, grasping drumsticks' urgency then forgets his body. Now enemy states deeply invade, state within disturbed, soldiers exposed on border, lord sleeps not at ease on mat, eats not sweet flavor, people's lives all hang on lord, what called sending off!' Summoned army officer asked saying: 'Military law arriving after appointed time what?' Answered: 'Should behead.' Zhuang Jia feared, sent men galloped to report Jing Gong, requested rescue. Already gone, not yet returned, thus then beheaded Zhuang Jia to show three armies. Three armies' soldiers all trembled. After long time, Jing Gong sent envoy holding tally to pardon Jia, galloped into army. Rangju said: 'General in army, lord's commands have some not accepted.' Asked army officer: 'Galloping through three armies law what?' Officer said: 'Should behead.' Envoy greatly feared. Rangju said: 'Lord's envoy cannot kill him.' Thus beheaded his groom, chariot's left driver, horse's left trace, to show three armies. Sent envoy back to report, then proceeded. Soldiers' encampments wells stoves food drink asked illness medicine, personally stroked and comforted them. All took general's provisions to feast soldiers, body shared rations equally with soldiers. First ranked their weak ones, three days then restrained troops. Sick ones all sought to go, contended to rouse out for battle. Jin army heard it, withdrew and left. Yan army heard it, crossed water and dispersed. Thus pursued them, then took the lost sealed territories former borders and led troops back. Not yet reached state, released troops, dissolved regulations, swore covenant then entered towns. Jing Gong with various grand officers welcomed in suburbs, rewarded army completed rites, then returned to palace. Having seen Rangju, honored him as Grand Marshal. Tian clan day by day increasingly honored in Qi.

sentences.zh: 已而大夫鮑氏、高、國之屬害之，譖於景公。

translations.literal: Soon after grand officers Bao clan, Gao, Guo and such harmed him, slandered to Jing Gong.

sentences.zh: 景公退穰苴，苴發疾而死。

translations.literal: Jing Gong dismissed Rangju, Rangju fell ill and died.

sentences.zh: 田乞、田豹之徒由此怨高、國等。

translations.literal: Tian Qi, Tian Bao and followers thus resented Gao, Guo and others.

sentences.zh: 其後及田常殺簡公，盡滅高子、國子之族。

translations.literal: Afterwards reached Tian Chang kill Jian Gong, completely extinguished Gao clan, Guo clan lineages.

sentences.zh: 至常曾孫和，因自立為齊威王，用兵行威，大放穰苴之法，而諸侯朝齊。

translations.literal: To Chang's great-grandson He, thus self-established as Qi Wei Wang, used troops exercised authority, greatly promulgated Rangju's methods, and feudal lords came to court Qi.

Soon after grand officers Bao clan, Gao, Guo and such harmed him, slandered to Jing Gong. Jing Gong dismissed Rangju, Rangju fell ill and died. Tian Qi, Tian Bao and followers thus resented Gao, Guo and others. Afterwards reached Tian Chang kill Jian Gong, completely extinguished Gao clan, Guo clan lineages. To Chang's great-grandson He, thus self-established as Qi Wei Wang, used troops exercised authority, greatly promulgated Rangju's methods, and feudal lords came to court Qi.

sentences.zh: 齊威王使大夫追論古者司馬兵法而附穰苴於其中，因號曰司馬穰苴兵法。

translations.literal: Qi Wei Wang sent grand officers to trace and discuss ancient Sima military methods and attached Rangju within them, thus named Sima Rangju Military Methods.
Qi Wei Wang sent grand officers to trace and discuss ancient Sima military methods and attached Rangju within them, thus named Sima Rangju Military Methods.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：余讀司馬兵法，閎廓深遠，雖三代征伐，未能竟其義，如其文也，亦少褒矣。

translations.literal: The Grand Historian says: I read Sima Military Methods, vast profound far-reaching, though Three Dynasties campaigns, could not exhaust their meanings, like their writing also, little praise.

sentences.zh: 若夫穰苴，區區為小國行師，何暇及司馬兵法之揖讓乎？

translations.literal: As for Rangju, small state conducting army, what leisure to reach Sima Military Methods' courtesy?

sentences.zh: 世既多司馬兵法，以故不論，著穰苴之列傳焉。

translations.literal: World already has many Sima Military Methods, therefore not discussed, recorded Rangju's hereditary biography.

The Grand Historian says: I read Sima Military Methods, vast profound far-reaching, though Three Dynasties campaigns, could not exhaust their meanings, like their writing also, little praise. As for Rangju, small state conducting army, what leisure to reach Sima Military Methods' courtesy? World already has many Sima Military Methods, therefore not discussed, recorded Rangju's hereditary biography.
